notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the kernel SRPM in CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8. It addresses 8 CVEs: CVE-2021-47013, CVE-2021-47670, CVE-2022-20141, CVE-2022-3239, CVE-2022-3545, and 3 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: kernel security update for CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8

branches.name: CIQ FIPS Compliant for Rocky Linux 8
